text: @Alyssafarah @PressSec @washingtonpost President Trump - in the past week, I have joined a company here on the front lines in New Orleans #StoneClinicalLabs #CEOChristopherRidgeway Our capacity has ramped up to cover a larger capacity of #COVID19 contact tracing @realDonaldTrump
